para.text: By March 1, of each year, the Chief Financial Officer shall submit a report to the Council for the preceding fiscal year that includes:
The number of eligible children in the CTF Program;
The race or ethnicity of each eligible child, where possible;
The amount of funds in each eligible child's trust fund account;
A list, by eligible child, of the purposes for which distributed funds were to be used;
The amount of money in the Fund gained by investment;
The amount of money in the Fund decreased by investment loss.
The amount of funding in the Fund decreased by administrative costs; and
Recommendations for improving the CTF Program.
